Thank you for your help.

Default setting is -Xmx256m, I know it is for single crawl.
I will try with 256*(same time crawls) MB memory.
Thank you very much!

And new question,
I created jobs for each 'site' group.
For example, engadget.com-CrawlJob, apple.com-CrawlJob, ....
Is it bad way?


takeru
